Package index

Queries

adverseEventsQuery()
Retrieve Adverse Events data for a specified drug.
chemblQuery()
Retrieve ChEMBL data for a specified gene and disease.
clinVarQuery()
Retrieve ClinVar data for a specified gene and disease.
compGenomicsQuery()
Retrieve Comparative Genomics data for a specified gene.
depMapQuery()
Retrieve DepMap Essentiality data for a specified gene.
europePMCQuery()
Retrieve Europe PMC data for a specified gene and disease.
geneBurdenQuery()
Retrieve Gene Burden data for a specified gene and disease.
geneOntologyQuery()
Retrieve Gene Ontology data for a specified gene.
geneticConstraintQuery()
Retrieve Genetic Constraint data for a specified gene.
genomicsEnglandQuery()
Retrieve Genomics England data for a specified gene and disease.
gwasColocalisation()
Retrieve calculated GWAS colocalisation data
gwasCredibleSet()
Retrieve GWAS credible set data
gwasCredibleSetsQuery()
Retrieve GWAS Credible Sets data for a specified target and disease.
hallmarksQuery()
Retrieve Cancer Hallmarks data for a specified gene.
indicationsQuery()
Retrieve Indications data for a specified drug.
interactionsQuery()
Retrieve Interactions data for a specified gene.
knownDrugsChemblQuery()
Retrieve Known Drugs data for a specified drug.
knownDrugsGeneQuery()
Retrieve Known Drugs data for a specified gene.
locus2GeneQuery()
Retrieve Locus-to-Gene Predictions data for a specified study locus.
mechanismsOfActionQuery()
Retrieve Mechanisms of Action data for a specified drug.
mousePhenotypesQuery()
Retrieve Mouse Phenotypes data for a specified gene.
orphanetQuery()
Retrieve Orphanet data for a specified gene and disease.
overlapInfoForStudy()
Retrieves overlap info for a study and a list of studies
pathwaysQuery()
Retrieve Pathways data for a specified gene.
pharmacogenomicsChemblQuery()
Retrieve Pharmacogenomics data for a specified drug.
pharmacogenomicsGeneQuery()
Retrieve Pharmacogenomics data for a specified gene.
pharmacogenomicsVariantQuery()
Retrieve Pharmacogenomics data for a specified variant.
qtlCredibleSetsQuery()
Retrieve QTL Credible Sets data for a specified variant.
safetyQuery()
Retrieve Safety Liabilities data for a specified gene.
sharedTraitStudiesQuery()
Retrieve Shared Trait Studies data for specified diseases.
uniprotLiteratureQuery()
Retrieve UniProt Literature data for a specified gene and disease.
uniProtVariantsQuery()
Retrieve UniProt Variants data for a specified variant.
variantEffectPredictorQuery()
Retrieve Variant Effect Predictor data for a specified variant.
variantEffectQuery()
Retrieve Variant Effect data for a specified variant.
variantsQuery()
Retrieve Variants data for a specified study locus.
